alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:26PM CDT until May 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hunt County in north central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenville City Lakes, or near Greenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Commerce, Caddo Mills, Campbell, Merit, Greenville City Lakes, Neylandville, Kellogg, Kingston, Clinton, Fairlie, Center Point, South Sulphur, Floyd and Dixon. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 88 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
